en.label: Origins
en.content: I started this digital garden in 2004 as a way to document my journey through the early web. Back then, CSS layouts were experimental, Flash was king, and IE6 was the villain of every story.

Over the last two decades, I've worked as a Frontend Architect, Design Systems Lead, and Creative Technologist. My passion lies in the intersection of design and engineering—where pixel-perfect aesthetics meet performant code.

zh.label: 起源
zh.content: 我于 2004 年开始了这片数字花园，以此记录我在早期网络世界中的旅程。在那个年代，CSS 布局还处于实验阶段，Flash 是王者，而 IE6 是每个故事中的反派。
在过去的二十年里，我曾担任前端架构师、设计系统主管和创意技术专家。我的热情在于设计与工程的交汇点——即像素完美的视觉美学与高性能代码相遇的地方。

quote.text: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
quote.author: Steve Jobs
